# Meetup API Trend Analysis

[![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)](https://nodesource.com/products/nsolid)



This ReadMe details the aggregation logic for finding real-time top trending topics using Meetup RSVPs Stream.
# Technologies Used
  - Akka Http
  - Akka Streams
  - Apache Kafka
  - Apache Spark

# Workflow

  - Consume Meetup RSVP Stream using the Meetup API via Akka Http and Akka Streams
  - Publish Stream Events to Apache Kafka
  - Consume Kafka Source and provide streaming aggregation logic to calculate top trends using Spark Structured Streaming.


# Trend Calculation
  - Trends are calculated per event using Exponential Weighted Moving Average
  - EWMA ( Details at : http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/computation.html#exponentially-weighted-windows)
 

## Requirements:
    - Docker Should be Installed on the Host Machine for running Kafka container.
# Steps to Run the Code
### 1. Run Meetup API Kafka Producer
 - Unzip the file *test_akka_json_streaming-0.1.zip*
 - Inside the folder, Run the script as sudo : `sudo  bin/test_akka_json_streaming`
### 2. Run Spark Project
 - Unzip the file *sparkstructuredstreamingkafka-0.1.zip*
 - Inside the folder, Run the script as sudo : `sudo  bin/sparkstructuredstreamingkafka-0.1`

### Output
 - The console prints the table of treanding topics with their corresponding 'primaryESValue' which is the *ewma score* of that topic.
